parameters.name: UserPreferenceValue
parameters.description: User preference to change as defined in swUserPreferenceTextFormat_e

parameters.name: Value
parameters.description: Text format to which to assign the user preference specified in UserPreferenceValue

title: IModelDoc2.SetUserPreferenceTextFormat
signature:
System.Boolean SetUserPreferenceTextFormat( 
   System.Int32
UserPreferenceValue
,
   System.Object
Value
)

parameters.name: UserPreferenceValue
parameters.description: User preference to change as defined in swUserPreferenceTextFormat_e

parameters.name: Value
parameters.description: Text format to which to assign the user preference specified in UserPreferenceValue

returns: True if the setting is changed successfully, false if not
remarks:
This method is equivalent to interactively setting document properties in the SOLIDWORKS Design software. See
System Options and Document Properties
for details.
